dcterms:description: The DENTEX dataset consists of panoramic X-rays collected from patients above 12 years of age, used for evaluating the performance of the SSAD framework in detecting dental diseases. It includes three detection tasks: quadrant detection, tooth enumeration, and disease diagnosis, covering four dental diseases: caries, deep caries, periapical lesions, and impacted teeth.
dcterms:title: DENTEX
